In England, in the seven days to 24 July, there were 211,162 new confirmed cases (375.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 July, there were 298,842 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 29% (87,680 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 29 July is 5,064,671 (8,997.9 cases per 100,000 population).
